Purpose: Define requirements for discovery of resources and relationships that are common to all service-based Swordfish conformant implementations.

DefaultClassOfService.Purpose: When there is at least one class of service instantiated, the DefaultClassOfService property should be set.

ConditionalRequirements.Purpose: ConditionalRequirements Comparison 1: The implementation must choose at least one selected media container (appropriate for the system's selected media type) and instantiate a collection for it.  This may be instantiated as a CapacitySources structure to feed a StoragePool, FileSystem, or Volume.  When drives are used, the Drives Collection in StorageServices shall be implemented.
ConditionalRequirements Comparison 2: One or more Line of Service Capabilities must be defined. This forms the basis for the system to build Lines of Service and Classes of Service.
